thread.title: Khade, Gandhi make big splash in senior state swimming championship
thread.title_full: Khade, Gandhi make big splash in senior state swimming championship - The Times of India

author: Suhas Nayse
title: Khade, Gandhi make big splash in senior state swimming championship
text:
NAGPUR: Olympian Veerdhawal Khade in the men's and Monika Gandhi in the women's were adjudged best swimmers as the two-day 77th Maharashtra senior state swimming championship, organized by the Nagpur District Amateur Swimming Association (NDAAA) concluded at the Kamgar Kalyan Mandal swimming pool, Raghuji Nagar, here on Sunday.
As expected both the Mumbai swimmers stamped their authority in style to dominate the tourney. Shlok Gupta (100m backstroke), Khade (100m freestyle and 100m butterfly), Mitesh Kunte (800m freestyle) and Gandhi (800m freestyle) created new state records.
Pune district emerged as overall champions with total 313 points (162 in the men's and 151 in the women's). Mumbai had to be satisfied with the runners-up spot with 254 points.
RESULTS
400m freestyle men: Mitesh Kunte (Kolhapur 4;18;44), Neel Gunde (PDAA 4;33;90), Ramesh Tamata (PDAA 4;55;40).
Women: Monique Gandhi (GMAAA 4;41;48), Arti Ghorpade (PDAAA) 5;02;87, Riddhi Hagwane (PDAAA 5;18;50).
50m backstroke men: Neel Gunde (PDAAA 0;28;47), Swejal Mankar (PDAAA 0;29;21), Harekrishna Gogai (Nagpur 0;31;06).
Women: Avantika Chavhan (GMAAA 0;31;60), Jyostana Pansare (TDAA 0;31;72), Yuga Birnale (PDAAA 0;32;92).
100m breaststroke: Shlok Gupta (GMAAA 1;10;28), Swejal Mankar (PDAAA 1;12;68), Mufaddal Kapasi (GMAAA 1;13;09).
Women: Aarti Patil (GMAAA 1;22;17), Rutuja Udeshi (TDAAA 1;22;63), Sagarika Jain (TDAAA 1;22;68).
4x100 medley relay men: PDAAA (4;46;47), Nagpur (4;51;48), Yawatmal (5;57;47)
Women: PDAAA (5;38;40), Nagpur (5;52;50).
100m freestyle men: Veerdhawal Khade (GMAAA) 0;53;69, Nimish Mule (Wardha 0;54;90), Viraj Dhokale (PDAAA 0;54;90).
Women: Avantika Chavhan (GMAAA 1;00;44), Rutuja Bhatt (GMAAA 1;01;60), Monique Gandhi (GMAAA 1;01;78).
200m Individual Medley men: Swejal Mankar (PDAAA 2;16;92), Viraj Dhokale (PDAAA 2;20;48), Prajwal Wagh (Kolhapur 2;24;74).
Women: Yuga Birnale (PDAAA 2;38;50), Aarti Patil (GMAAA 2;40;14), Yukta Vakhariya (PDAAA 2;45;72).
Medley mixed relay: PDAAA (2;07;87), TDAAA (2;09;50), NDAAA ( 2;13;06).
200m backstroke men: Neel Gunde (PDAAA 2;16;98), Rushikesh Jambhale (Kolhapur 2;24;25), Atharva Dandekar (GMAAA 2;43;94).
Women: Aarti Ghorpade (PDAAA 2;33;62), Yuga Birnaale (PDAAA 2;39;16), Shruti Pusalkar (TDAAA 2;45;20).
100m butterfly men: Veerdhawal Khade (GMAAA 0;57;63), Mihir Ambre (PDAAA 0;58;72), Mitesh Kunte (0;58;72).
Women: Trisha Karkhanis (TDAAA 1;05;81), Rutuja Bhatt (GMAAA 1;06;68), Jyostana Pansare (TDAAA 1;06;69).
